title: Fruit of the Loom Men's Size 3-Pack Premium Tall Man V-Neck
description: These Fruit of the Loom premium tall men's v-neck tees are a soft and comfortable essential in a man's wardrobe. These men's cotton tees are made from a 100 percent ring spun cotton fabric and are specially designed to fit a tall man's body. Wear these Fruit of the Loom premium tall men's v-neck tees as an undershirt beneath professional button-up shirts or dress up these men's cotton tees with a jacket and jeans for casual wear.
